item.description: Using pct in Proxmox VE Proxmox VE (PVE) is a powerful open-source virtualization platform that supports both LXC containers and KVM virtual machines. The pct command line tool is specifically designed to manage LXC containers. Below is a detailed step-by-step guide to help master the pct command. 1.
